Brown wrote:
>
> From: Brown <mjcmbrwn@...>
>
> Hi Michelle
>
> I'm afraid I didn't read your post re paganism because it went on too long - not words wise, but screen wise. Is it me? or is it you? For me, your posts come as 1 or 2 very very long lines?
> Carol
>

ditto for me too. Couldn't even get my reader to wrap it.

Buzz

messages.msgSnippet: Yep, me too, with a period between every word??  Can you word wrap it at that end Michelle? Ann
messages.messageBody:
Yep, me too, with a period between every word?? Can you word wrap it at that end Michelle?
Ann

messages.subject: Re: reading.and.networking
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Michelle I m afraid I didn t read your post re paganism because it went on too long - not words wise, but screen wise. Is it me? or is it you? For me, your
messages.messageBody:
Hi Michelle

I'm afraid I didn't read your post re paganism because it went on too long - not words wise, but screen wise. Is it me? or is it you? For me, your posts come as 1 or 2 very very long lines?
Carol

earthmagik@... wrote:

> From: earthmagik@...
>
> Hi.my.son.is.4.1/2.and.learning.to.read..I.see.he.is.very.interested,by.his.sounding.letters.out,reading.signs.memorizing.books,and.always.being.willing.to.sit.down.and.read.one.with.me...I.sense.he.is.ready.for.more.or.to.move.forward.more..is.setting.down.for.a.spell..and.sounding.things.out.like.we.have.been.enough..or.are.their.some.other.tools.we.can.utilize.to.expand.low-cost..he.just.seems.ready.for.more...any.suggestions.would.be.helpful..also.how.are.people.networking.in.their.areas..I.am.interested,in.participating.ina.group.setting.occasionally,and.I.have.lots.of.great.group.ideas...field.trips,story-time,guestspeakers..playtime.etc...and.I.have.made.a.flyer.to.post.in.the.library....I.am.interested.to.know.how.you.all.are.notworking.in.you.area...we.are.N.of.Seattle..if.any.one.is.in.this.area.give.mema.holler...and.a.big.thanks.for.all.the.information.I.recently.joined.this.group..and.have.been.so.delited.to.see.the.posts.each.morning...very.informative......Michelle
>
